speak.value: [Intro 1] How you doing?
[Intro 2] How's it going?
[Intro 3] Hi.
[Question1 1] What's the weather been like?
[Question1 2] How's the weather out there?
[Question1 3] What's it like out there? The weather, I mean.
[Question2 1] So what's your favorite type of weather?
[Question2 2] What sort of weather do you like?
[Payoff 1] Well, let me tell ya something.
[Payoff 2] Here's a little somethin'.
[Rain 1] As a droid, I'm not too fond of rain.
[Rain 2] Rain's alright, as long as my parts aren't showing.
[Hot 1] The heat's never good for my circuits.
[Hot 2] You ever been to Tatooine? Now that's heat.
[Cold 1] Cold don't usually bother me much, so long as my joints can actuate.
[Cold 2] If yer talkin' about cold then Hoth's the place for you.
[Cloudy 1] Cloudy days really do a number on my solar cells.
[Cloudy 2] You haven't seen cloudy 'till you've been to Cloud City itself.
[Sunny 1] Sun's good for you. Good for me, too, if I'm needin' a little extra energy.
[Sunny 2] Tatooine's twice as sunny as anyplace around here. And by that I mean it literally has two suns.
[Snow 1] I personally like snow, but it gets in my locomotors whenever I step out.
[Snow 2] I've seen snowpiles the size of this bar on Hoth, and that was on a light day.
